data.comment: The first-half is under way at John Smith's Stadium - Huddersfield kick-off to start the match.
Goal! Huddersfield have got their heads in front thanks to a Fraizer Campbell strike.
In the minute 40, Huddersfield's Christopher Schindler has been booked in Huddersfield.
At John Smith's Stadium, Brad Potts has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Richard Stearman is booked for the home team.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Huddersfield - Preston with the kick-off.
Alan Browne grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at John Smith's Stadium.
In the minute 53, Alan Browne is on target to give Preston a 1-2 advantage.
The home team have replaced Christopher Schindler with Adama Diakhaby. This is the first substitution made today by Carlos Corberan.
Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a second substitution, with Carel Eiting replacing Lewis O'Brien.
In the minute 66, Alan Browne (Preston) has received a yellow card from Josh Smith.
Patrick Bauer for Preston has been booked by Josh Smith and receives a first yellow card.
Josh Koroma is on a sub for Isaac Mbenza for Huddersfield.
In the minute 72, Tom Barkhuizen is replacing Scott Sinclair for Preston at John Smith's Stadium.
Naby Sarr (Huddersfield) is red-carded and dismissed.
Alex Neil is making the team's second substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Sean Maguire replacing Daniel Johnson.
In the minute 87, Huddersfield's Josh Koroma has been booked in Huddersfield.
The match has come to a close in Huddersfield. The final score is 1-2.
The away team have replaced Ryan Ledson with Josh Harrop. This is the third substitution made today by Alex Neil.
Sean Maguire (Preston) has received a first yellow card.
Josh Harrop (Preston) gets a yellow card.
